EmailTemplate.name: 09-30-21 HOS eWeekly Newsletter.Reminder: P1535 to CX5 Transition
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: P1535 to CX5 Transition
EmailTemplate.textOnly: September 30, 2021 P1535 to CX5 Transition Reminder Effective 9/21/21 NCR will no longer accept quotes for all P1535 models through Aloha Essentials and traditional orders as they have passed their End of Sale date. All quotes should reflect the new CX5 models. For your reference, the CX5 models below are the terminals available in new Front-Of-House packages for quoting: New CX5 Models: PID number Description 7773-1215-0203 CX5 15" 4:3 PCAP; Cel; 8GB; 120GB SSD; MSR; APA; Serial I/O; WIN10 2019; US 7773-1215-0205 CX5 15" 4:3 PCAP; Cel; 8GB DDR3L; 120GB SSD; MSR; Integ Serial I/O; Win10; US (Wall Mount) Any quotes already submitted with P1535s will be fulfilled with P1535s, but any P1535 quotes not yet submitted will have to be updated with a CX5 replacement for the previously attached P1535 terminals. If you have any questions, please contact your Channel Account Manager. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
